verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יָק֤וּם <WH6965> If there arise בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <WH7130> among נָבִ֔יא <WH5030> you a prophet א֖וֹ <WH176> or חֹלֵ֣ם <WH2492> or a dreamer חֲל֑וֹם <WH2472> of dreams וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and giveth אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> about א֖וֹת <WH226> thee a sign א֥וֹ <WH176> or מוֹפֵֽת׃ <WH4159> or a wonder

וּבָ֤א <WH935> come to pass הָאוֹת֙ <WH226> And the sign וְהַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> or the wonder אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> whereof he spake אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto thee saying נֵֽלְכָ֞ה <WH1980> go אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֧ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֛ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְדַעְתָּ֖ם <WH3045> which thou hast not known וְנָֽעָבְדֵֽם׃ <WH5647> and let us serve

לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> Thou shalt not hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> unto the words הַנָּבִ֣יא <WH5030> of that prophet הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he א֛וֹ <WH176> or אֶל־ <WH413> about חוֹלֵ֥ם <WH2492> or that dreamer הַחֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> of dreams הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מְנַסֶּ֞ה <WH5254> proveth יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> לָדַ֗עַת <WH3045> you to know הֲיִשְׁכֶ֤ם <WH3426> whether ye אֹֽהֲבִים֙ <WH157> love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> and with all your soul

אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> after יְהוָ֧ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <WH430> your God תֵּלֵ֖כוּ <WH1980> along וְאֹת֣וֹ <WH853> תִירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> and fear וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹתָ֤יו <WH4687> his commandments תִּשְׁמֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH8104> him and keep וּבְקֹל֣וֹ <WH6963> his voice תִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <WH8085> and obey וְאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תַעֲבֹ֖דוּ <WH5647> and ye shall serve וּב֥וֹ תִדְבָּקֽוּן׃ <WH1692> him and cleave

וְהַנָּבִ֣יא <WH5030> And that prophet הַה֡וּא <WH1931> he א֣וֹ <WH176> or חֹלֵם֩ <WH2492> or that dreamer הַחֲל֨וֹם <WH2472> of dreams הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he יוּמָ֗ת <WH4191> shall be put to death כִּ֣י <WH3588> because דִבֶּר־ <WH1696> because he hath spoken סָ֠רָה <WH5627> to turn עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> [you] away from the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֜ם <WH430> your God הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> which brought you out אֶתְכֶ֣ם ׀ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהַפֹּֽדְךָ֙ <WH6299> and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> of bondage לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <WH5080> to thrust מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> thee out of the way אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which צִוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to walk בָּ֑הּ וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from the midst

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If יְסִֽיתְךָ֡ <WH5496> entice אָחִ֣יךָ <WH251> If thy brother בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אִ֠מֶּךָ <WH517> of thy mother אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בִנְךָ֨ <WH1121> or thy son אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בִתְּךָ֜ <WH1323> or thy daughter א֣וֹ ׀ <WH176> or אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> or the wife חֵיקֶ֗ךָ <WH2436> of thy bosom א֧וֹ <WH176> or רֵֽעֲךָ֛ <WH7453> or thy friend אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who כְּנַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> which [is] as thine own soul בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <WH5643> thee secretly לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying נֵֽלְכָ֗ה <WH1980> go וְנַֽעַבְדָה֙ <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> which thou hast not known אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thou nor thy fathers

מֵאֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> [Namely] of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5439> which [are] round about הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <WH7138> you nigh אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about א֖וֹ <WH176> or הָרְחֹקִ֣ים <WH7350> unto thee or far off מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> at מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> from thee from the [one] end הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> even unto the [other] end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תֹאבֶ֣ה <WH14> Thou shalt not consent ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> unto him nor hearken אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תָח֤וֹס <WH2347> pity עֵֽינְךָ֙ <WH5869> unto him neither shall thine eye עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַחְמֹ֥ל <WH2550> him neither shalt thou spare וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תְכַסֶּ֖ה <WH3680> neither shalt thou conceal עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הָרֹג֙ <WH2026> But thou shalt surely תַּֽהַרְגֶ֔נּוּ <WH2026> kill יָֽדְךָ֛ <WH3027> him thine hand תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בּ֥וֹ בָרִֽאשׁוֹנָ֖ה <WH7223> shall be first לַהֲמִית֑וֹ <WH4191> upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <WH3027> the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> and afterwards

וּסְקַלְתּ֥וֹ <WH5619> And thou shalt stone בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> him with stones וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> that he die כִּ֣י <WH3588> because בִקֵּ֗שׁ <WH1245> because he hath sought לְהַדִּֽיחֲךָ֙ <WH5080> to thrust thee away מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> from the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <WH3318> which brought thee out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> of bondage

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And all Israel יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shall hear וְיִֽרָא֑וּן <WH3372> and fear וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and will never יוֹסִ֣פוּ <WH3254> no more לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> and shall do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> any הָרָ֛ע <WH7451> such wickedness הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> as this is among ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תִשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> If thou shalt hear בְּאַחַ֣ת <WH259> [say] in one עָרֶ֗יךָ <WH5892> of thy cities אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> hath given לְךָ֛ לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> thee to dwell שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> there saying

יָצְא֞וּ <WH3318> are gone out אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children בְלִיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH1100> of Belial מִקִּרְבֶּ֔ךָ <WH7130> from among וַיַּדִּ֛יחוּ <WH5080> you and have withdrawn אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> the inhabitants עִירָ֖ם <WH5892> of their city לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying נֵלְכָ֗ה <WH1980> go וְנַעַבְדָ֛ה <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3045> which ye have not known

וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֧ <WH1875> Then shalt thou enquire וְחָקַרְתָּ֧ <WH2713> and make search וְשָׁאַלְתָּ֖ <WH7592> and ask הֵיטֵ֑ב <WH3190> diligently וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> If אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> and behold [if it be] truth נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> certain הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> [and] the thing נֶעֶשְׂתָ֛ה <WH6213> is wrought הַתּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <WH8441> abomination הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> [that] such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> among

הַכֵּ֣ה <WH5221> Thou shalt surely תַכֶּ֗ה <WH5221> smite אֶת־ <WH853> יֹֽשְׁבֵ֛י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> of that city [הַהוּא כ] (הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> he ק) לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword הַחֲרֵ֨ם <WH2763> destroying it utterly אֹתָ֧הּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֛הּ וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <WH929> and all that [is] therein and the cattle לְפִי־ <WH6310> thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁלָלָ֗הּ <WH7998> all the spoil תִּקְבֹּץ֮ <WH6908> And thou shalt gather אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> of it into the midst רְחֹבָהּ֒ <WH7339> of the street וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֨ <WH8313> thereof and shalt burn בָאֵ֜שׁ <WH784> with fire אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all שְׁלָלָהּ֙ <WH7998> and all the spoil כָּלִ֔יל <WH3632> thereof every whit לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהָיְתָה֙ <WH1961> shall be a תֵּ֣ל <WH8510> and it shall be an heap עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall never תִבָּנֶ֖ה <WH1129> it shall not be built again עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nothing יִדְבַּ֧ק <WH1692> And there shall cleave בְּיָדְךָ֛ <WH3027> to thine hand מְא֖וּמָה <WH3972> nought מִן־ <WH4480> that הַחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> of the cursed thing לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> order יָשׁ֨וּב <WH7725> may turn יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> that the LORD מֵחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> from the fierceness אַפּ֗וֹ <WH639> of his anger וְנָֽתַן־ <WH5414> and shew לְךָ֤ רַחֲמִים֙ <WH7356> thee mercy וְרִֽחַמְךָ֣ <WH7355> and have compassion וְהִרְבֶּ֔ךָ <WH7235> upon thee and multiply כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <WH7650> thee as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> unto thy fathers

כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> When thou shalt hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹר֙ <WH8104> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to do הַיָּשָׁ֔ר <WH3477> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God ס
